value:
$SbpBGM_MNS_FE15_07,0|$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|Hm... What's all this doing here?
You there! Please take this over
to the courtyard.$k$pCan anyone else lend a free hand?
I have a few other things that need
to be hauled off as well...$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Hello, Commander Anna...$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|Ah! Princess Reginn! ...Did you visit
Fáfnir in his cell again today?$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Pain2|Yes... He's been suffering for a long
time now—from nightmares...and
headaches too.$k$p$EFace_Pain|I'm sorry for all the destruction
he's caused as a result...$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Yes, well, it has certainly been
keeping the Heroes busy.$k$pThe queen assures us she's all right
too, but she has been staying in bed
to be safe.$k$pAlfonse and Sharena have been
looking after the kingdom's affairs
in her stead.$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Pain2|...$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|But don't worry about that, Princess
Reginn! It's not like any of this was
your fault.$k$p$EFace|Defense is my responsibility after all.
You're the one helping us out. And
on that note...$k$pDid you say you remembered
something that might be a clue?
The Tower of Niðavellir, was it?$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Right, well, it's primarily used for
the king's ascension ceremony,
where the king first takes the throne.$k$pActually, when Fáfnir first started
acting strange, Ótr went to the tower
thinking he might find some clue...$k$p$EFace_Pain2|But when he came back... Well, he's
worn a grim expression ever since,
and sides with Fáfnir in all things.$k$pMaybe if we visit the Tower of
Niðavellir too, we might find
some information.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|But it's located high on a steep
mountainside, and the guards are
likely on high alert...$k$pAs much as I'd like to have a look
around, under the circumstances,
I'm not sure it's feasible...$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face|Oh, that's all right! I've been relying
on you all so much, I feel I'm asking
more than my share from you...$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|We'll just have to wait until things
calm down a little more, and then
we'll reconsider visiting the tower.$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Er, excuse me, Commander Anna.
Might I speak with you a moment?$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|Oh, Princess Fjorm, hello. Do you
need something from me?$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Pain|We've just received report that the
remnants of Niðavellir's army have
invaded a border village.$k$pIf we do not send help soon, they
may not last long...$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|What? Now?! I'm sorry for the
burden, but I have my hands
full here...$k$pWill you take care of the invaders
for me, $Nu?$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_リュート,ch10_29_Lute_M_Normal,Face|The world is larger than any of us
could possibly comprehend... I must
never stop learning.$k$p$Sbs1000|
